articles.title: Medical groups are concerned that RFK Jr. may dismiss a panel of primary care experts - NPR
articles.description: The American Medical Association is urging HHS Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. not to oust members of the U.S. Preventive Services Task Force, an independent group of experts focused on primary care.
articles.content: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. may soon dismiss the members of the U.S. Preventive Services Task Force, an advisory panel of primary care experts, raising "deep concern" fr… [+3518 chars]
